content.html: Assertion: Atomic Blonde is INSANELY underrated. Evidence: Have you SEEN the 10 minute single take fight scene? Charlize Theron is BOSS in this scene. The ability to make a scene like this realistic is almost impossible. But this scene, the endurance, the rigid discipline...
content.value:
Assertion: Atomic Blonde is INSANELY underrated.

Evidence: Have you SEEN the 10 minute single take fight scene?

Charlize Theron is BOSS in this scene. The ability to make a scene like this realistic is almost impossible.

But this scene, the endurance, the rigid discipline...
